name: Cows&Co
description:
Cows&Co is a 2D puzzle game where you take on the role of a farmer named Ronnie. Every day you did your job, namely, visit the cows in your camp, until at some point your cows were attacked by wolves. Now you need to have time to drive the cows into your pens before the wolves have time to eat them all. From time to time you will have helpers, namely our smaller friends - dogs. Don't let the evil wolves eat the cows!

Features:
  • Music of LenstroYa
  • Ginonkins graphics
  • more than 20 levels
